00033 #ifndef MSQ_SYM_MATRIX_3D_HPP
00034 #define MSQ_SYM_MATRIX_3D_HPP
00035 
00036 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00037 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00038 
00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 class MESQUITE_EXPORT SymMatrix3D {
00042 private:
00043   double d_[6];
00044 
00045 public:
00046   enum Term {
00047     T00 = 0,
00048     T01 = 1,
00049     T02 = 2,
00050     T10 = T01,
00051     T11 = 3,
00052     T12 = 4,
00053     T20 = T02,
00054     T21 = T12,
00055     T22 = 5
00056   };
00057   
00058   inline static Term term( unsigned r, unsigned c )
00059     { return (Term)(r <= c ? 3*r - r*(r+1)/2 + c : 3*c - c*(c+1)/2 + r); }
00060   
00061   SymMatrix3D() {}
00062   
00063   SymMatrix3D( double diagonal_value ) {
00064     d_[T00] = d_[T11] = d_[T22] = diagonal_value;
00065     d_[T01] = d_[T02] = d_[T12] = 0.0;
00066   }
00067   
00068   SymMatrix3D( double t00, double t01, double t02,
00069                            double t11, double t12,
00070                                        double t22 ) 
00071   {
00072     d_[T00] = t00;
00073     d_[T01] = t01;
00074     d_[T02] = t02;
00075     d_[T11] = t11;
00076     d_[T12] = t12;
00077     d_[T22] = t22;
00078   }
00079     
00081   SymMatrix3D( const Vector3D& u )
00082   {
00083     d_[T00] = u[0] * u[0];
00084     d_[T01] = u[0] * u[1];
00085     d_[T02] = u[0] * u[2];
00086     d_[T11] = u[1] * u[1];
00087     d_[T12] = u[1] * u[2];
00088     d_[T22] = u[2] * u[2];
00089   }
00090     
00091  
00092   double& operator[]( unsigned t )       { return d_[t]; }
00093   double  operator[]( unsigned t ) const { return d_[t]; }
00094   
00095   double& operator()( unsigned short r, unsigned short c )
00096     { return d_[term(r,c)]; }
00097   double  operator()( unsigned short r, unsigned short c ) const
00098     { return d_[term(r,c)]; }
00099   
00100   inline SymMatrix3D& operator+=( const SymMatrix3D& other );
00101   inline SymMatrix3D& operator-=( const SymMatrix3D& other );
00102   inline SymMatrix3D& operator*=( double scalar );
00103   inline SymMatrix3D& operator/=( double scalar );
00104 };
00105 
00106 inline SymMatrix3D operator-( const SymMatrix3D& m )
00107 {
00108   return SymMatrix3D( 
00109     -m[SymMatrix3D::T00], -m[SymMatrix3D::T01], -m[SymMatrix3D::T02],
00110                           -m[SymMatrix3D::T11], -m[SymMatrix3D::T12],
00111                                                 -m[SymMatrix3D::T22] );
00112 }
00113 
00114 inline SymMatrix3D& SymMatrix3D::operator+=( const SymMatrix3D& other )
00115 {
00116   d_[0] += other.d_[0];
00117   d_[1] += other.d_[1];
00118   d_[2] += other.d_[2];
00119   d_[3] += other.d_[3];
00120   d_[4] += other.d_[4];
00121   d_[5] += other.d_[5];
00122   return *this;
00123 }
00124 
00125 inline SymMatrix3D& SymMatrix3D::operator-=( const SymMatrix3D& other )
00126 {
00127   d_[0] -= other.d_[0];
00128   d_[1] -= other.d_[1];
00129   d_[2] -= other.d_[2];
00130   d_[3] -= other.d_[3];
00131   d_[4] -= other.d_[4];
00132   d_[5] -= other.d_[5];
00133   return *this;
00134 }
00135 
00136 inline SymMatrix3D& SymMatrix3D::operator*=( double s )
00137 {
00138   d_[0] *= s;
00139   d_[1] *= s;
00140   d_[2] *= s;
00141   d_[3] *= s;
00142   d_[4] *= s;
00143   d_[5] *= s;
00144   return *this;
00145 }
00146 
00147 inline SymMatrix3D& SymMatrix3D::operator/=( double s )
00148 {
00149   d_[0] /= s;
00150   d_[1] /= s;
00151   d_[2] /= s;
00152   d_[3] /= s;
00153   d_[4] /= s;
00154   d_[5] /= s;
00155   return *this;
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 inline SymMatrix3D operator+( const SymMatrix3D& a, const SymMatrix3D& b )
00160   { SymMatrix3D r(a); r += b; return r; }
00161 inline SymMatrix3D operator-( const SymMatrix3D& a, const SymMatrix3D& b )
00162   { SymMatrix3D r(a); r -= b; return r; }
00163 inline SymMatrix3D operator*( const SymMatrix3D& a, double s )
00164   { SymMatrix3D r(a); r *= s; return r; }
00165 inline SymMatrix3D operator*( double s, const SymMatrix3D& a )
00166   { SymMatrix3D r(a); r *= s; return r; }
00167 inline SymMatrix3D operator/( const SymMatrix3D& a, double s )
00168   { SymMatrix3D r(a); r /= s; return r; }
00169 inline SymMatrix3D operator/( double s, const SymMatrix3D& a )
00170   { SymMatrix3D r(a); r /= s; return r; }
00171 
00172 inline Vector3D operator*( const Vector3D& v, const SymMatrix3D& m )
00173 {
00174   return Vector3D( v[0]*m[0] + v[1]*m[1] + v[2]*m[2],
00175                    v[0]*m[1] + v[1]*m[3] + v[2]*m[4],
00176                    v[0]*m[2] + v[1]*m[4] + v[2]*m[5] );
00177 }
00178 inline Vector3D operator*( const SymMatrix3D& m, const Vector3D& v )
00179 {
00180   return v * m;
00181 }
00182 
00184 inline SymMatrix3D outer( const Vector3D& v )
00185 {
00186   return SymMatrix3D( v[0]*v[0], v[0]*v[1], v[0]*v[2],
00187                                  v[1]*v[1], v[1]*v[2],
00188                                             v[2]*v[2] );
00189 }
00190 
00195 inline SymMatrix3D outer_plus_transpose( const Vector3D& u,
00196                                          const Vector3D& v )
00197 {
00198   return SymMatrix3D( 2*u[0]*v[0], u[0]*v[1] + u[1]*v[0], u[0]*v[2] + u[2]*v[0],
00199                                    2*u[1]*v[1]          , u[1]*v[2] + u[2]*v[1],
00200                                                           2*u[2]*v[2] );
00201 }
00202 
00203 inline const SymMatrix3D& transpose( const SymMatrix3D& a )
00204   { return a; }
00205 
00206 inline double det( const SymMatrix3D& a )
00207 {
00208   return a[0]*a[3]*a[5] + 2.0*a[1]*a[2]*a[4]
00209        - a[0]*a[4]*a[4] - a[3]*a[2]*a[2] - a[5]*a[1]*a[1];
00210 }
00211 
00212 inline SymMatrix3D inverse( const SymMatrix3D& a )
00213 {
00214   SymMatrix3D result( a[3]*a[5] - a[4]*a[4],
00215                       a[2]*a[4] - a[1]*a[5],
00216                       a[1]*a[4] - a[2]*a[3],
00217                       a[0]*a[5] - a[2]*a[2],
00218                       a[1]*a[2] - a[0]*a[4],
00219                       a[0]*a[3] - a[1]*a[1] );
00220   result /= det( a );
00221   return result;
00222 }
00223 
00224 inline double Frobenius_2( const SymMatrix3D& a )
00225 {
00226   return   a[0]*a[0] +
00227          2*a[1]*a[1] +
00228          2*a[2]*a[2] +
00229            a[3]*a[3] +
00230          2*a[4]*a[5] +
00231            a[5]*a[5];
00232 }
00233 
00234 inline double Frobenius( const SymMatrix3D& a )
00235   { return std::sqrt( Frobenius_2(a) ); }
00236

00238 } // namespace Mesquite

00240 #endif
